msg: Dear student, Berkeley University Of California health professionals have been closely monitoring the spread of COVID-19 over the past two months.Therefore the university is form an online part time job to sustain the students living.I'm please to inform you that our reputable companionship CORESTAFF SERVICES Inc, is currently running a student empowerment program.Kindly netmail back with your personal netmailaddress if interested in this job position.Kind respect from Donna Lisa, HR Manager CORESTAFF SERVICES.
